summary:
This mod is FAR from finished, it requires all DLC(Dawnguard, Heartfires, Dragonborn).
Spacious Ancient Sanctuary, has Everything(this includes an epic Shrine of Sithis).
If it doesn't, tell me and if it's cool I will add it!
This mod will be for After the main DB story.
descriptionHtml:
[Pre-Alpha]
[Author's notes]
Since this is my very first mod(I like to think I'm a fast learner though), it may be a while until I can throw something presentable at you guys, so I might release a few Alpha version as I progress.
(Constructive) feedback will be highly appreciated!
[End of note]
Forgotten for hundreds of years, this massive sanctuary near Riften holds all a loyal Listener will ever need to appease our dread father and mother.
For this sanctuary I plan to let dear Astrid make a new appearance as 'Guardian Astrid'.
As penance Sithis sent her back to serve the Listener and to steward this Sanctuary(to make it a bit customisable, like replace your bed with a Coffin, ...)
It will be accessible via an abandoned cellar.

This sanctuary comprises of a Large hall (dining, ..), sleeping quarters for all (themed human, vampire, werewolf. The last 2 will also contain some beds), 4 chambers for the Speakers and a master chamber for the Listener, treasure chamber, a torture area (duh) complete with a waste pit, there's catacombs, a chamber for the Nightmother linked to a chamber for the keeper, an epic *hidden* shrine of sithis, a library, a room for magical studies, an alchemy garden with a *planned* re-introduction of a single 'Purgeblood' node, several storage chambers, a smithy (possibly with a 'Void Forge'), ... I also plan on adding a lot of secret passages, with a central hub for what I hope to be quick access to everything.

I will also add a bunch of ghost guardians, some generic, some merchants (also a BS).

Of course there will also be voice acting, a few quest to fully unlock all functions. I also aim to make this as lore-friendly as possible, please correct me when I make mistakes.

I was also toying with the idea of adding a small dungeon to it, that may or may not contain a dragon and a new void-themed shout.

If you, the people like this idea I will keep updating this and adding info as it comes to me :)
